topic.title: Inter-transcriber Reliability
topic.shortdesc: The inter-transcriber reliability report provides several metrics of agreement between blind transcribers in a Phon session.

body.p: To open the inter-transcriber reliability wizard select Session Inter-transcriber Reliability from the Session Editor window menu. The menu item will be disabled if the editor is in blind mode or there are less than two transcribers for the session.

The first step of the wizard allows selection of domain for comparison (group or word), the transcribers for comparison, and which metrics will be included. Standard options for ignoring diacritics are also available. After clicking Next a HTML report is produced as described below and displayed as the last step of the wizard. Options to save the report and export report tables will be available from the toolbar and context menu.
The final row of each table will include an average of each selected metric.
